name: The Dungeon of Color
description:
Run through the dungeon, kill the bosses, and try to rack up as many kills as you can in The Arena! 

Controls - (Click "instructions" on the splash screen.)

WASD/Arrow Keys/Joystick to move.

Click to shoot an arrow. Press space to use your sword. Note: Swords intentionally don't work on bosses. 

See this on my website! Click!

This game was developed for the MS Paint Jam.

Your kill count is the number in the top right.

This game was created in 48 hours for an MS Paint Game Jam.

Music is by me.
